lead_paragraph: An article last Monday about Rafael Nadal’s victory over Roger Federer to win the Australian Open men’s singles tennis title omitted part of a quotation by Nadal. He said of Federer after their match: “Remember, you’re a great champion. You’re one of the best in history.” He did not say, “You are the best in history.”.
